descriptionText.attr1: A asteroid base of the pirate group known as the Beggars.
The Beggars are a professional crime syndicate, focusing on extortion.
Often operating in areas experiencing economic booms, for a reasonable fee they'll let you live and carry on with business.
Those wondering how this faction is able to set-up operations so quickly in new areas of space, only have to look at their base design in detail.
The recent gold rush for Outsider tech found in debris, has been a dinner bell for their cut.
Their ships tend to focus on fear, preferring rapid fire chain guns to drown out any thoughts of resistance with a constant barrage against a ship's hull.
